mapper.select: SELECT gcua.idx AS idx, gcua.name AS `name`, gcua.group_id AS group_id, gcua.user_id AS user_user_id, uu.avatar_url AS user_avatar_url, gcg.group_name AS class_group_group_name, gcua.company AS company, gcua.applied_at AS applied_at , gcua.status AS status FROM grtu_class_user_apply gcua JOIN u_user uu ON uu.user_id = gcua.user_id JOIN gr_class_group gcg ON gcg.group_id=gcua.group_id WHERE gcg.user_id = #{userId} AND gcg.is_enable = 1 ORDER BY gcua.status ASC

SELECT uu.user_id as user_user_id , uu.avatar_url as user_avatar_url, gcua.company as company, gcua.position as `position`, gcua.type as `type`, gcua.name as `name`, gcua.gender as gender, gcua.mobile as mobile, gcua.brief as brief, gcua.status as status, gcua.applied_at as applied_at, gcg.group_id as class_group_group_id, gcg.group_name as class_group_group_name, gcg.school_name as class_group_school_name, gcg.class_name as class_group_class_name, gcg.user_id as class_group_user_user_id FROM grtu_class_user_apply gcua join gr_class_group gcg on gcg.group_id = gcua.group_id join u_user uu on uu.user_id =gcua.user_id WHERE gcua.idx = #{applyId}
SELECT idx FROM grtu_class_user_apply WHERE `status` = 1 AND group_id = #{groupId} AND user_id =#{userId}

SELECT gcua.idx AS idx, gcua.name AS `name`, gcua.applied_at AS applied_at, gcg.group_id AS class_group_group_id, gcg.group_name AS class_group_group_name, gcg.user_id AS class_group_user_user_id FROM grtu_class_user_apply gcua JOIN gr_class_group gcg ON gcg.group_id = gcua.group_id WHERE gcua.status = 1 AND (gcua.applied_at >= #{beginTimestamp} AND gcua.applied_at < #{endTimestamp})
